issue.title: [CF 61] Portuguese BR translator
issue.body:
If you guys need a translator to portuguese BRAZIL let me know

Handless@Zuluhed


> Posted by CurseForge user rodd2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #61 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for the offer to do this! While I do have several friends that would be able to do this for me also, I'm not sure if they would be wanting to when the time comes, so I will contact you if needed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

CurseForge has added ptBR localization to its localization system. If you still want to help translate TMW into Portuguese, you can now begin doing so!

Link: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/localization/ptBR/

Edited Sep 11, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
